channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for FL

item.title: Report X-2023070133
item.description:
Report X-2023070133

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-28T15:11:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-28
  • City: ORLANDO
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The box was found wet in the load area and moved to the hazmat cage for reports. DescribePack: 1 of the jugs in the box of Rapicide Part A was leaking contents from under the cap, even though the cap was on tight. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed upright into a hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023061733
item.description:
Report X-2023061733

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-27T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-27
  • City: JACKSONVILLE
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet box was found during unload from trailer on preload shift. Box was placed in a plastic bag and brought to cage for inspection. DescribePack: Loose caps on top of bottles DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: After inspection box and contents were placed in a hazmat bag and salvage drum.

item.title: Report X-2023061712
item.description:
Report X-2023061712

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-27T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-27
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet. Upon inspection found 4 bottles of Zep calcium, lime & rust stain remover 1-gallon had small dents on sides & loose lids which resulted to leakage & stained contents. DescribePack: Bottles had small dents on sides & loose lids which resulted to leakage & stained contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023061701
item.description:
Report X-2023061701

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-27T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-26
  • City: PALMETTO
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found to be damaged while being unloaded from the origin truck. The package was removed from the rest and placed in a drum in the hazmat cage. DescribePack: There is a small hole in the side of the bottle that looks to have occurred when the box got the hole in the side. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was immediately separated and placed in the drum and put in the hazmat cage

item.title: Report X-2023061631
item.description:
Report X-2023061631

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-24T15:13:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-23
  • City: POMPANO BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box was discovered leaking on the van-lines. It was moved into a red tote along with a HazMat bag. It went to the HazMat Cage for processing. DescribePack: The bottom of the box was soaked. The metal can was stored side-ways within the box. The cap was slightly loose. There was a very strong odor. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was moved to the HazMat Cage using a red tote and HazMat bag.

item.title: Report E-2023070065
item.description:
Report E-2023070065

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-22T00:38:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-21
  • City: SAINT PETERSBURG
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: RANGER LANDSTAR INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On June 21, 2023, at 1400 ET, Emergency Response and Training Solutions (ERTS) was contacted by Landstar personnel in St. Petersburg, Florida regarding the release of approximately (55) gallons of COR61-AA-332 DCPD Laminating Resin (Resin Solution (contains Styrene Monomer), UN1866, 3, III) from (1) 55-gallon poly drum. Contractors were dispatched to clean up the release. Upon arrival, contractors were unable to locate any damaged cargo. No waste was generated from this event.

item.title: Report E-2023060644
item.description:
Report E-2023060644

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-22T00:38:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-04-03
  • City: Miami
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: EAGLE TRANSPORT CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver was stopped delivering fuel at Braman Car Care Center when a City of Miami police officer exited the car wash and struck our drop fitting. This resulted in damage to the drop fitting and causing a spill of approximately 10 gallons of premium gas. Police reported to the scene due to the accident, not due to the spill.
